src_original: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇâgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /  te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvantôttrasyanti  saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /  te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty anuttarāyāḥ
tgt_original: 向小智人讀誦解說。 他人聞已驚疑怖畏。

src_original: [ Bendall ed p61 ---> ]  samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
tgt_original: 於菩提心而生退沒。 樂聲聞乘。

src_original: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam  utpādaya /  tena tvaṃ saṃsārān niryāsyasi /
tgt_original: 不如早向聲聞緣覺入於涅槃。

src_original: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvit-yā  mūlâpattiḥ //
kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena /  śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau  cittam utpādayasva /
tgt_original: 汝何用學戒威儀當速發大乘心。

src_original: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma
tgt_original: 身口意業當得清淨亦不受惡報。
